entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `dotnet.exe` detects paths twice #25423
  • `dotnet test` fails to launch `DumpMinitool*.exe` because it is a DLL - doesn't produce dump for process of different architecture #25421
  • Exclude entire packages from single-file #25411
  • .NET CLI: Allow to specify multiple packages at once `dotnet add package <package1> <package2> <package3> ..` #25396

Closed

  • NU1505 appears in 17.3.0 Preview 1 #25387

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove transitive dependencies for System.Private.Uri #25420
    Area-Workloads
  • Remove transitive dependencies for System.Private.Uri #25419
    Area-Workloads
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #25409
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #25403
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Enable signature checks in the package downloader #25395
    Area-Workloads

Merged

  • Always detect if SelfContained was specified by the user #25367
    Servicing-approved, Area-NetSDK, 6.0.3xx
  • Servicing F# #25325
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Feature band fallback with workload update #24678
    Area-Workloads
  • Switch the last non-helix test over to running on helix. #25324
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1770620 #25346
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Cache pipeline inputs when suppressed: #24928
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Support suppressing transitive framework reference downloads, and other changes #25358
  • Support PublicKey metadata on InternalsVisibleTo #25000
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Enable the 4.8.1 target in sdk style projects #25393
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the hardcoded net5.0 to the current framework #24787
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Check if publishaot is used #25323
